name: Shivaliva Zero
description:
Shivaliva Zero is a short and simple single-player platformer, inspired by the classic side-scrolling games. It consists of 7 short levels that you each have to finish under 2 minutes, can you beat them all? You play as a character from the yogic lore named Shiva.  Shiva has to collect Rudraksha, known as Shiva´s tears of ecstasy.

Controls: 

A/Left, D/Right keys to move left and right.

Spacebar to jump.

Esc to pause and unpause the game. 

Use mouse to select the buttons.
